channel.title: Comments on: I need a Jargon-Free Silverlight description/blurb

item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description: That's not a bad idea -- how would you explain a multimedia CD though? :) (I haven't encountered one in many years -- but maybe it's the software I use or business/home environment I'm in ...?)
item.content:encoded: That’s not a bad idea — how would you explain a multimedia CD though? :) (I haven’t encountered one in many years — but maybe it’s the software I use or business/home environment I’m in …?)

item.title: By: Rodrigo Ratan
item.dc:creator: Rodrigo Ratan
item.description: Aaron, try to say that it's similar technologies used to make those multimedia CD's, I used this to explain Flash back in 97 :)
item.content:encoded: Aaron, try to say that it’s similar technologies used to make those multimedia CD’s, I used this to explain Flash back in 97 :)
